Congratulations! On double posting!

Find -

   public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

And below that you’ll see all the level requirements.

item.title: Need minor help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Anonomus111 Anonomus111
item.description:
@Anonomus111 wrote:

Can anyone tell me how to add level requirements on my torsos, and claws?
Also… can somebody tell me how to add DDS specs?
And come to think of it, I need a global object which trains mage… I think I can do that one myself. BRB.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 01:54:54 AM[/size][hr]Just taught myself how to add global objects that work…
case 7058:(bookshelf)
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You have been generously rewarded with Mage XP.”);
actionTimer = 13;
setAnimation(252);
addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

makeGlobalObject(Xcord, Ycord, 7058, -1, 10);//Mage Training.

Read full topic
item.source: Need minor help with my server
